head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths MALLORY, WINIFRED L.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths MALLORY, WINIFRED L.

block.p: MALLORY-Winifred L. On June 8th of Old Brookville and Vero Beach, FL. Loving wife of the late George B. Mallory. Dear mother of Douglas C. Mallory, Lynne Mallory-Winter, Paula Mallory Engel, and Diana M. Lanchoney, and seven grandchildren. Visitation at the Fairchild Funeral Chapel, 1570 Northern Blvd, Manhasset on Wednesday from 4-8pm. Funeral Services on Thursday June 15th at 4pm Christ Episcopal Church, Northern Blvd, Manhasset. Interment private.
